price: Nígbà náà, (Ànábì) Mūsā ju ọ̀pá rẹ̀ sílẹ̀. Ó sì ń gbé ohun tí wọ́n pa nírọ́ kalẹ̀ mì kálókáló.
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا يَأۡفِكُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā mūsā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya talqafu mā yafikūna
